title: Q11 Revision KoL MC
prompt: Which of these is the <u>most</u> concise and accurate revision to the sentence?
description:
Read this sentence.

In very low temperatures, wait for electronic equipment to return back to the normal room temperature before restarting the equipment.
feedback: The correct answer is: “In very low temperatures, wait for electronic equipment to return to room temperature before restarting the equipment.” The other answers use additional words without adding meaning. The phrase “return back” is redundant, and so are the phrases “normal room temperature” and “cold or near frozen.” The best answer is the most concise.
